attributes.action: to create a balance of investment for travellers of the north in new rolling stock equal to the amounts invested in the south.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Whilst Train Operating Companies invest in new vehicles, Northern Rail residents are riding on older trains from other parts of the network with an average of 21 years old. We the undersigned petition the prime minister to create a major investment undertaking in the next HLOS/Franchise period to invest in new rolling stock which at this point in time will be in excess 27 years average  age instead of cascading tired stock from the south.
